forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 4am, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 36. Wind chill values as low as 24. South southeast wind 22 to 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before 1pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 1pm and 4pm, then rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as 25. South southeast wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
